items.sentence: It\'ll be quicker to walk than to take a taxi.
It\'ll take too much time for Tom to get here.
It\'s a miracle that you were able to survive.
Tom didn\'t mention anything about that to me.
Tom didn\'t mention his reason for being late.
Maybe Tom should quit before he hurts himself.
There is no scientific basis for these claims.
I\'ve been waiting for you since two o\'clock.
I\'ve decided to ask Mary if she\'ll marry me.
Tom promised that he\'d never lie to me again.
Tom said he didn\'t feel like talking to Mary.
Tom can\'t say for sure when Mary will arrive.
I checked the door to make sure it was locked.
Sit on the sofa and make yourself comfortable.
Suicide is a crime in some parts of the world.
Tell Tom that he needs to wear a tie tomorrow.
Thank you for the chocolate. It was delicious.

He\'s always saying bad things about his wife.
